headline.print_headline: Risks: Antidepressants Not Linked to Stillbirths

docs.abstract: A large new study may offer some reassurance to women concerned about antidepressant use during pregnancy.
docs.snippet: A large new study may offer some reassurance to women concerned about antidepressant use during pregnancy.

docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Leaf was a physician, researcher, administrator and professor who studied heart disease, longevity and the dangers of global warming.

headline.seo: Alexander Leaf Dies at 92; Linked Diet and Health
headline.main: Alexander Leaf Dies at 92; Linked Diet and Health
headline.print_headline: Alexander Leaf, 92, Dies; Linked Diet and Health

docs.abstract: Alexander Leaf, versatile physician and research scientist who was an early advocate of diet and exercise to prevent heart disease, and who helped scientifically establish the dangers global warming poses to the human species, dies at age 92.
docs.snippet: Dr. Leaf was a physician, researcher, administrator and professor who studied heart disease, longevity and the dangers of global warming.

docs.lead_paragraph: A book about self-image, another about diet and one about habits do not follow the usual self-help path.

headline.seo: Three Books on Becoming a Better You — Books of Style
headline.main: Uncommon Advice for Seeking a Fresh Start
headline.print_headline: Uncommon Advice for Seeking a Fresh Start

docs.abstract: Liesl Schillinger reviews books The Beauty Experiment: How I Skipped Lipstick, Ditched Fashion, Faced the World Without Concealer, and Learned to Love the Real Me by Phoebe Baker Hyde, Wheat Belly Cookbook: 150 Recipes to Help You Lose the Wheat, Lose the Weight, and Find Your Path Back to Health by William Davis and Making Habits, Breaking Habits: Why We Do Things, Why We Don’t, and How to Make Any Change Stick by Jeremy Dean.
docs.snippet: A book about self-image, another about diet and one about habits do not follow the usual self-help path.

docs.lead_paragraph: Readers respond to an Op-Ed essay saying that being overweight actually reduces mortality risk.

headline.main: The Link Between Weight and Health
headline.print_headline: The Link Between Weight and Health

docs.snippet: Readers respond to an Op-Ed essay saying that being overweight actually reduces mortality risk.

headline.main: Making a Case for the Medical Checkup

docs.abstract: A new report concluded that general health checkups for adults did not help patients live longer or healthier lives, but it may not be time to forgo the annual doctor's visit, one doctor argues.
docs.snippet: A new report concluded that general health checkups for adults did not help patients live longer or healthier lives, but it may not be time to forgo the annual doctor's visit, one doctor argues.

docs.lead_paragraph: Letters to the editor about the heart drug BiDil, independence for the elderly and recovery after trauma.
docs.snippet: Letters to the editor about the heart drug BiDil, independence for the elderly and recovery after trauma.

docs.lead_paragraph: The drug, to be called Sirturo, was discovered by scientists at Janssen, the pharmaceuticals unit of Johnson & Johnson, and is the first in a new class of drugs that aims to treat the drug-resistant strain of the disease.

headline.seo: F.D.A. Approves Sirturo, a New Tuberculosis Drug
headline.main: F.D.A. Approves Drug for Resistant Tuberculosis
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Approves Drug for Resistant Tuberculosis

docs.abstract: Food and Drug Administration says it has approved Sirturo, new treatment for multidrug-resistant tuberculosis that can be used as alternative when other drugs fail; warns that drug, which belongs to an entirely new class of drugs, should be used only for patients who do not have other more tested treatment options available.
docs.snippet: The drug, to be called Sirturo, was discovered by scientists at Janssen, the pharmaceuticals unit of Johnson & Johnson, and is the first in a new class of drugs that aims to treat the drug-resistant strain of the disease.
